iiv.data

Class AffineMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • iiv.data.AffineMatrix

  • public class AffineMatrix
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to store an affine matrix and handle affine matrix math.
    Since:
    iiV1.1.8.2
    See Also:
    CNUDimensions

    • Constructor Detail

      • AffineMatrix

        public AffineMatrix(double[][] matrix)
        Constructs a new instance of AffineMatrix.
        Parameters:
        matrix - matrix to build affine matrix from. Internal matrix last row always 0,0,0,1 (only 3X4 portion of input matrix used.) If matrix is null creates an identity matrix. Also, missing parts of 3X4 matrix filled in as an identity would be.

        public static AffineMatrix combineAffineMatrices(AffineMatrix[] matrices)
        Constructs a matrix that is the combined product of the input matrices.
        Parameters:
        matrices - array of matrices to combine into one
        Returns:
        single matrix that combines the input matrices

      • buildScale

        public static AffineMatrix buildScale(double xscale,
                                      double yscale,
                                      double zscale)
        Constructs a scale affine matrix class object.
        Parameters:
        xscale - scale along x axis
        yscale - scale along y axis
        zscale - scale along z axis
        Returns:
        affine matrix for performing translations.

      • buildTranslation

        public static AffineMatrix buildTranslation(double xtrans,
                                            double ytrans,
                                            double ztrans)
        Constructs a translation affine matrix class object.
        Parameters:
        xtrans - translation in x direction
        ytrans - translation in y direction
        ztrans - translation in z direction
        Returns:
        affine matrix for performing translations.

      • buildRotation

        public static AffineMatrix buildRotation(double angle,
                                         double xdir,
                                         double ydir,
                                         double zdir)
        Constructs a rotation affine matrix class object.
        Parameters:
        angle - angle in radians to rotate by
        xdir - x component of vector to rotate around
        ydir - y component of vector to rotate around
        zdir - z component of vector to rotate around
        Returns:
        affine matrix for performing rotation.

        Creates an internal inverse matrix.

        public boolean hasInverse()
        Validates wether matrix has an inverse.
        Returns:
        true if able to calculate matrix inverse.

      • value

        public double value(int row,
                    int column)
        Gets the matrix value at the given indices.
        Parameters:
        row - row to get value for
        column - column to get value for
        Returns:
        value from matrix at given row and column

      • inverse

        public double inverse(int row,
                      int column)
        Gets the inverse matrix value at the given indices.
        Parameters:
        row - row to get value for
        column - column to get value for
        Returns:
        value from inverse matrix at given row and column

      • product

        public XYZDouble product(XYZDouble xyz,
                         XYZDouble results)
        Calculates the product of this affine matrix with an double x,y,z value.
        Parameters:
        point - array containing (x,y,z) point stored in order as (point[0],point[1],point[2])
        results - array to contain results of product ordered as above. If null a new array is allocated.
        Returns:
        array containing results of product. If results was non-null this will be the same array otherwise a newly allocated array.

      • inverseProduct

        public XYZDouble inverseProduct(XYZDouble xyz,
                                XYZDouble results)
        Calculates the inverse product of this affine matrix with an double x,y,z value.
        Parameters:
        point - array containing (x,y,z) point stored in order as (point[0],point[1],point[2])
        results - array to contain results of product ordered as above. If null a new array is allocated.
        Returns:
        array containing results of product. If results was non-null this will be the same array otherwise a newly allocated array.

      • invertAffineMatrix

        public static final double[][] invertAffineMatrix(double[][] rm)
        Calculates the inverse of a 3X3 matrix or affine 4X4 matrix assuming the last row is 0 0 0 1.
        Returns:
        4X4 inverse of input matrix or null.

      • affineMatrixProduct

        public static final AffineMatrix affineMatrixProduct(AffineMatrix leftMatrix,
                                                     AffineMatrix rightMatrix)
        Create product of two affine matrix assuming last row identity.
        Parameters:
        leftMatrix - left side affine matrix
        rightMatrix - right side affine matrix
        Returns:
        affine matrix product

      • mat4X4product

        public static final double[][] mat4X4product(double[][] leftMat,
                                             double[][] rightMat)
        Create product of two 4X4 matrices
        Parameters:
        leftMat - coordinate map treated like the left side of a matrix multiplication
        rightMat - coordinate map treated like the right side of a matrix multiplication
        Returns:
        product

      • affineMatProduct

        public static final double[] affineMatProduct(double[][] affineMatrix,
                                              double[] point,
                                              double[] results)
        Calculates the product of an affine matrix with an double x,y,z point.
        Parameters:
        affineMat - affine matrix which must be at least 4x3 -- last row of 4x4 not used
        point - array containing (x,y,z) point stored in order as (point[0],point[1],point[2])
        results - array to contain results of product ordered as above. If null a new array is allocated.
        Returns:
        array containing results of product. If results was non-null this will be the same array otherwise a newly allocated array.

      • affineMatProduct

        public static final double[] affineMatProduct(double[][] affineMatrix,
                                              int[] point,
                                              double[] results)
        Calculates the product of an affine matrix with an integer x,y,z point.
        Parameters:
        affineMat - affine matrix which must be at least 4x3 -- last row of 4x4 not used
        point - array containing (x,y,z) point stored in order as (point[0],point[1],point[2])
        results - array to contain results of product ordered as above. If null a new array is allocated.
        Returns:
        array containing results of product. If results was non-null this will be the same array otherwise a newly allocated array.

      • affineMatProduct

        public static final XYZDouble affineMatProduct(double[][] affineMatrix,
                                               double[] point,
                                               XYZDouble results)
        Calculates the product of an affine matrix with an double x,y,z point.
        Parameters:
        affineMat - affine matrix which must be at least 4x3 -- last row of 4x4 not used
        point - array containing (x,y,z) point stored in order as (point[0],point[1],point[2])
        results - array to contain results of product ordered as above. If null a new array is allocated.
        Returns:
        array containing results of product. If results was non-null this will be the same array otherwise a newly allocated array.

      • affineMatProduct

        public static final XYZDouble affineMatProduct(double[][] affineMatrix,
                                               int[] point,
                                               XYZDouble results)
        Calculates the product of an affine matrix with an integer x,y,z point.
        Parameters:
        affineMat - affine matrix which must be at least 4x3 -- last row of 4x4 not used
        point - array containing (x,y,z) point stored in order as (point[0],point[1],point[2])
        results - array to contain results of product ordered as above. If null a new array is allocated.
        Returns:
        array containing results of product. If results was non-null this will be the same array otherwise a newly allocated array.

      • affineMatProduct

        public static final XYZDouble affineMatProduct(double[][] affineMatrix,
                                               XYZDouble xyz,
                                               XYZDouble results)
        Calculates the product of an affine matrix with an XYZDouble.
        Parameters:
        affineMat - affine matrix which must be at least 4x3 -- last row of 4x4 not used
        xyz - xyz values to multiply
        results - array to contain results of product ordered as above. If null a new array is allocated.
        Returns:
        array containing results of product. If results was non-null this will be the same array otherwise a newly allocated array.

      • identityMatrix

        public static final double[][] identityMatrix()
        Builds a 4X4 identity matrix.

      • rotationMatrix

        public static final double[][] rotationMatrix(int axis,
                                              double angle)
        Builds a 4X4 rotation matrix of given angle around given axis.
        Parameters:
        axis - one of X_AXIS, Y_AXIS, or Z_AXIS
        angle - rotation angle in radians

      • rotationAngleVectorToMatrix

        public static final double[][] rotationAngleVectorToMatrix(double angle,
                                                           double xdir,
                                                           double ydir,
                                                           double zdir)
        Constructs a 4X4 rotation matrix.
        Parameters:
        angle - angle in radians to rotate by
        xdir - x component of vector to rotate around
        ydir - y component of vector to rotate around
        zdir - z component of vector to rotate around
        Returns:
        matrix for performing rotation
